snippet: Mondelez International, maker of Cadbury Creme Eggs, has tweaked the recipe of the chocolate shell of its gooey treats.
abstract: Mondelez International, maker of Cadbury Creme Eggs, changes recipe of chocolate shell in Britain, angering customers.
lead_paragraph: Mondelez International, maker of Cadbury Creme Eggs, has tweaked the recipe of the chocolate shell of its gooey treats.

headline.print_headline: British Fans of Creme Eggs Outraged by Recipe Change
headline.main: British Fans of Creme Eggs Outraged by Recipe Change
